title: #ICYMI - Gender Inequality in Sports, with Heather O’Reilly
description:
In case you missed this episode on the Playing with Science channel…. Hosts Gary O’Reilly and Chuck Nice investigate the systemic gender bias and discrimination happening in professional sports with World Cup winner and former USWNT soccer star Heather O’Reilly, and economist Andrew Zimbalist, PhD.

Photo Credit: Courtesy of Heather O’Reilly.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
